channel.title: Making my own private server
channel.description:
HI, I followed the tut untill the part were it says u have to edit Compile.bat and i edited compile.bat and when i open it it says
[code]"error: cannot read: *.java 1 error exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server press any key to continue . . ."[/code]
wat should i do????
If you got an answer to my qeustion please post it
